ERRORS.v1: Sorry, I can't understand the command. Please say again.
ERRORS.v2: Sorry, I didn't get that. Could you say it again?.

NO_INPUT.MESSAGE: Sorry I didn't catch that. Could you repeat yourself?
NO_INPUT.EXIT: Thank you for using Rocket Chat

WELCOME.SUCCESS: Welcome To Rocket Chat Google Action. What Would you like to do today?
WELCOME.ERROR: To start using this action, please link your account to authenticate.
WELCOME.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry, I could not connect you with your account.

POST_MESSAGE.CONFIRM_DISCUSSION_INTENT: You want to send, %s, to discussion %s. Is that correct?
POST_MESSAGE.CONFIRMATION: You want to send, %s, to room %s, is that correct?
POST_MESSAGE.NO_CHANNEL: There is no room named %s in your subscriptions list.
POST_MESSAGE.CONFIRM_DM_INTENT: You want to send, %s, to user, %s, is that correct?
POST_MESSAGE.NO_USER: There is no user named %s in your contacts list.
POST_MESSAGE.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't send your message right now.

CREATE_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry You Are Currently Signed Out. To Access This Intent , please complete your account linking
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't create the channel %s right now.
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR_DUPLICATE_NAME: Sorry, the channel %s already exists. Please try again with different channel name.
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR_INVALID_NAME: Sorry, %s is not a valid channel name. Please try again with a single word name for the channel.

DELETE_CHANNEL.CONFIRM_INTENT: You want to delete room {{roomname}}, is that correct?
DELETE_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't delete the channel %s right now.
DELETE_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, the channel %s does not exist. Please try again with different channel name.

GET_LAST_MESSAGE_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't find the channel %s right now.
GET_LAST_MESSAGE_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, the channel %s does not exist. Please try again with different channel name.
GET_LAST_MESSAGE_FROM_CHANNEL.UNSUPPORTED_MEDIA_TYPE: Sorry, the message is not supported on this device

MAKE_MODERATOR.CONFIRM_INTENT: You want to make %s, as moderator of room %s, is that correct?
MAKE_MODERATOR.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't assign a moderator right now.
MAKE_MODERATOR.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't assign a moderator to %s right now.

ADD_ALL_TO_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I am unable to add all users to the channel right now.
ADD_ALL_TO_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I am unable to add all users to channel %s right now.

ADD_OWNER.CONFIRM_INTENT: You want to make %s, as an owner of room %s, is that correct?
ADD_OWNER.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't assign a owner to the channel right now.
ADD_OWNER.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't assign a owner to channel %s right now.

ARCHIVE_CHANNEL.CONFIRM_INTENT: You want to archive room {{roomname}}, is that correct?
ARCHIVE_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't archive this channel right now.
ARCHIVE_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't archive channel %s right now.

GET_USER_MENTIONS_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't get your user mention right now.

LEAVE_CHANNEL.CONFIRM_INTENT: You want to leave room {{roomname}}, is that correct?

KICK_USER_FROM_CHANNEL.CONFIRM_INTENT: You want to kick %s, from room %s, is that correct?

STATUS.ERROR: Sorry, I could not change your status.

NO_ACTIVE_USER: Couldn't find an active user named {{username}} from your contacts.
NO_ACTIVE_DISCUSSION: Couldn't find an active discussion named {{name}} from your discussions.
NO_ACTIVE_ROOM: Couldn't detect a room named {{name}}, maybe it's not active since long.
NO_ROOM: You are not part of any channel or group named %s .
NO_ACTIVE_SUBSCRIPTION: Couldn't detect a room or user named {{name}} from your subscriptions list. Maybe it's not active.
GENERIC_REPROMPT: Anything else I can help you with?

NO_USER_WITH_ROLE: There is no {{role}} named {{username}} in room {{channelname}}.
